title: Emotional Haliburton helped off with leg injury
description: Indiana's Tyrese Haliburton went down with a noncontact right lower leg injury in the first quarter of Game 7.
author: Jamal Collier

title: Sources: Durant to Rockets in blockbuster trade
description: The Suns have agreed to trade Kevin Durant to the Rockets for Jalen Green, Dillon Brooks, the No. 10 pick in this year's draft and five second-round picks, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Why Bumrah is most complete fast bowler ever - Finn
description: Former England bowler Steven Finn explains why India superstar Jasprit Bumrah is the most complete fast bowler of all time after he takes 5-83 in the first Test.

title: Heartbreak for Fleetwood as Bradley denies him first PGA title
description: American Keegan Bradley pips England's Tommy Fleetwood on the 18th hole to claim the Travelers Championship.

title: Five takeaways from LSU baseball's national championship victory vs Coastal Carolina
description: LSU baseball beat Coastal Carolina to win the College World Series and national title. Here are five takeaways from the win.

title: USMNT vs Haiti player ratings â€” Tillman continues to put imprint on Pochettino's team
description: Mauricio Pochettino's USMNT completed a perfect group stage at the 2025 Gold Cup on Sunday with a 2-1 win over Haiti, and midfielder Malik Tillman was again a star of the show.

title: England and India parity? First Test hangs in the balance
description: A shock decision at the toss, an India batting collapse, a Jasprit Bumrah masterclass, an Ollie Pope century and some Harry Brook heartbreak later, we are no closer to knowing who is going to win the first Test between England and India at Headingley.

title: Stokes strikes late to leave England-India Test perfectly poised
description: India are two down, leading England by 96, going into the fourth morning of the first Test at Headingley after another hugely-absorbing day's play on Sunday.
